pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:5.1: Ime kho panāyyāyo sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:7.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:7.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:7.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:8.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:8.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:8.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:8.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:8.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:8.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:10.2: Yā anādariyaṃ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambentī nivāseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:11.2: asañcicca, assatiyā, ajānantiyā, gilānāya, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:14.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:14.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:14.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:15.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:15.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā, tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:15.3: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:15.4: Atha kho bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:15.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karontī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:15.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi karissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:15.12: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:15.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:16.1: “Na udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:17.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:18.1: Tena kho pana samayena gilānā bhikkhuniyo udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ kukkuccāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:18.3: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānāya bhikkhuniyā udake uccārampi passāvampi kheḷampi kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:18.4: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:19.1: “Na udake agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karissāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:20.1: Na udake agilānāya uccāro vā passāvo vā kheḷo vā kātabbo.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:20.2: Yā anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake agilānā uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karoti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-sk1-75:21.2: asañcicca, assatiyā, ajānantiyā, gilānāya, thale kato udakaṃ ottharati, āpadāsu, ummattikāya, khittacittāya, vedanāṭṭāya, ādikammikāyāti.
